sqls.sql: SELECT id, purchase_order_return_id, purchase_order_return_code, goods_id, goods_code, goods_name, goods_generic_name, goods_specification, goods_place, preparation_id, unit_id, (select name from SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary d where d.`category`="preparation_id" and d.`value` = preparation_id ) as preparation_name, (select name from SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary d where d.`category`="unit_id" and d.`value` = unit_id ) as unit_name, manufacturer, registration_code, batch_code, production_time, expire_time, return_quantity, storage_quantity, purchase_price, amount, rejection_reason, storage_time, acceptance_id, acceptance_code, create_time, update_time FROM SAAS_TEST.saas_purchase_order_return_detail where purchase_order_return_id = ${key}

SELECT id, code, supplier_id, supplier_code, supplier_name, salesperson_name, salesperson_tel, acceptance_id, acceptance_code, purchase_order_id, purchase_order_code, return_type, return_reason, ( SELECT NAME FROM SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary dd WHERE dd.`category` = "return_type" AND dd.`value` = return_type ) AS return_type_name, purchaser_id, purchaser_name, out_time, approver_id, approver_name, out_user_id, out_user_name, out_reviewer_id, out_reviewer_name, out_reviewer_time, amount, create_time, update_time, rejection_reason from SAAS_TEST.saas_purchase_order_return where id=${key}
select CASE WHEN CONVERT(${test8.storage_quantity},SIGNED) >= CONVERT(${test8.return_quantity},SIGNED) THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END AS mustBreak
SELECT CASE WHEN ${test8} = '[]' THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS mustBreak

insert into SAAS_TEST.saas_purchase_order_return(
id,
code,
supplier_id,
supplier_code,
supplier_name,
status,
salesperson_name,
salesperson_tel,
acceptance_id,
acceptance_code,
purchase_order_id,
purchase_order_code,
return_type,
return_reason,
purchaser_id,
purchaser_name,
approver_id,
approver_name,
out_user_id,
out_user_name,
out_reviewer_id,
out_reviewer_name,
out_reviewer_time,
amount,
rejection_reason,
remark,
out_time, create_time, update_time ) values(
${id},
${code},
${supplier_id},
${supplier_code},
${supplier_name},
${status},
${salesperson_name},
${salesperson_tel},
${acceptance_id},
${acceptance_code},
${purchase_order_id},
${purchase_order_code},
${return_type},
${return_reason},
${purchaser_id},
${purchaser_name},
${approver_id},
${approver_name},
${out_user_id},
${out_user_name},
${out_reviewer_id},
${out_reviewer_name},
${out_reviewer_time},
${amount},
${rejection_reason},
${remark},
now(), now(), now() )

insert into saas_serial_number(type, date, num ) select 'pur_return_num', now(), IFNULL((select num FROM saas_serial_number WHERE type = 'pur_return_num' and to_days(date) = to_days(now()) order by num desc LIMIT 0,1),0)+1 as num;
SELECT CONCAT('GJTC',DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%d'),LPAD(num,4,'0')) AS code FROM saas_serial_number WHERE type = 'pur_return_num' and to_days(date) = to_days(now()) order by num desc LIMIT 0,1;

insert into SAAS_TEST.saas_purchase_order_return_detail(
purchase_order_return_id,
purchase_order_return_code,
goods_id,
goods_code,
goods_name,
goods_generic_name,
goods_specification,
goods_place,
preparation_id,
unit_id,
manufacturer,
registration_code,
batch_code,
production_time,
expire_time,
return_quantity,
storage_quantity,
purchase_price,
amount,
rejection_reason,
storage_time,
acceptance_id,
acceptance_code,
remark,
storage_id,
create_time, update_time ) values(
${keyProperty},
${code},
${test8.goods_id},
${test8.goods_code},
${test8.goods_name},
${test8.goods_generic_name},
${test8.goods_specification},
${test8.goods_place},
${test8.preparation_id},
${test8.unit_id},
${test8.manufacturer},
${test8.registration_code},
${test8.batch_code},
${test8.production_time},
${test8.expire_time},
${test8.return_quantity},
${test8.storage_quantity},
${test8.purchase_price},
${test8.return_quantity}*${test8.purchase_price},
${test8.rejection_reason},
${test8.storage_time},
${test8.acceptance_id},
${test8.acceptance_code},
${test8.remark},
${test8.storage_id},
now(), now() )

update SAAS_TEST.saas_purchase_order_return set amount= (select IFNULL(sum(amount), 0) from SAAS_TEST.saas_purchase_order_return_detail where purchase_order_return_id = ${keyProperty}) where id=${keyProperty}

insert into SAAS_TEST.saas_inventory(
goods_id,
goods_code,
batch_code,
supplier_id,
supplier_code,
quantity,
order_price,
remark,
creater_id,
creater_name,
modifier_id,
modifier_name,
status,
storage_id,
qualified, inventory_type, create_time, update_time ) values(
${test8.goods_id},
${test8.goods_code},
${test8.batch_code},
${supplier_id},
${supplier_code},
-1 * ${test8.return_quantity},
${test8.purchase_price},
${test8.remark},
${test8.creater_id},
${test8.creater_name},
${test8.modifier_id},
${test8.modifier_name},
${test8.status},
${test8.storage_id},
${return_type}, 3, now(), now() )

insert into SAAS_TEST.saas_inventory_detail(
inventory_id,
goods_id,
goods_code,
goods_name,
supplier_id,
supplier_code,
goods_generic_name,
goods_specification,
manufacturer,
goods_place,
preparation_id,
unit_id,
registration_code,
batch_code,
purchased_price,
quantity,
status,
creater_id,
creater_name,
storage_id,
qualified, inventory_type, create_time, update_time ) values(
${keyProperty},
${test8.goods_id},
${test8.goods_code},
${test8.goods_name},
${supplier_id},
${supplier_code},
${test8.goods_generic_name},
${test8.goods_specification},
${test8.manufacturer},
${test8.goods_place},
${test8.preparation_id},
${test8.unit_id},
${test8.registration_code},
${test8.batch_code},
${test8.purchase_price},
-1 * ${test8.return_quantity},
${test8.status},
${test8.creater_id},
${test8.creater_name},
${test8.storage_id},
${return_type}, 3, now(), now() )

insert into SAAS_TEST.saas_inventory(
goods_id,
goods_code,
batch_code,
supplier_id,
supplier_code,
quantity,
order_price,
remark,
creater_id,
creater_name,
modifier_id,
modifier_name,
status,
storage_id,
qualified, inventory_type, create_time, update_time ) values(
${test8.goods_id},
${test8.goods_code},
${test8.batch_code},
${supplier_id},
${supplier_code},
${test8.return_quantity},
${test8.purchase_price},
${test8.remark},
${test8.creater_id},
${test8.creater_name},
${test8.modifier_id},
${test8.modifier_name},
${test8.status},
${test8.storage_id},
2, 6, now(), now() )

insert into SAAS_TEST.saas_inventory_detail(
inventory_id,
goods_id,
goods_code,
goods_name,
supplier_id,
supplier_code,
goods_generic_name,
goods_specification,
manufacturer,
goods_place,
preparation_id,
unit_id,
registration_code,
batch_code,
purchased_price,
quantity,
status,
creater_id,
creater_name,
storage_id,
qualified, inventory_type, create_time, update_time ) values(
${keyProperty},
${test8.goods_id},
${test8.goods_code},
${test8.goods_name},
${supplier_id},
${supplier_code},
${test8.goods_generic_name},
${test8.goods_specification},
${test8.manufacturer},
${test8.goods_place},
${test8.preparation_id},
${test8.unit_id},
${test8.registration_code},
${test8.batch_code},
${test8.purchase_price},
${test8.return_quantity},
${test8.status},
${test8.creater_id},
${test8.creater_name},
${test8.storage_id},
2, 6, now(), now() )

update SAAS_TEST.saas_purchase_order_return set
id=${id},
code=${code},
supplier_id=${supplier_id},
supplier_name=${supplier_name},
acceptance_id=${acceptance_id},
acceptance_code=${acceptance_code},
purchase_order_id=${purchase_order_id},
purchase_order_code=${purchase_order_code},
return_type=${return_type},
purchaser_id=${purchaser_id},
purchaser_name=${purchaser_name},
out_time=${out_time},
approver_id=${approver_id},
approver_name=${approver_name},
out_user_id=${out_user_id},
out_user_name=${out_user_name},
out_reviewer_id=${out_reviewer_id},
out_reviewer_name=${out_reviewer_name},
out_reviewer_time=${out_reviewer_time},
amount=${amount},
create_time=${create_time},
update_time=${update_time},
where id=${key}

condition.title: 单据状态
condition.name: status
condition.sql: select a.value id,a.name text from SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary a where a.category = 'purchase_return_status'

step.breakMessage: 没有需要保存的信息，请先添加！
退货数量大于可退数量，请重新输入！

condition.name: return_type
condition.title: 退货类型
condition.sql: select a.value id,a.name text from SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary a where a.category = 'return_type'

condition.name: return_reason
condition.title: 退货原因
condition.sql: select a.value id,a.name text from SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary a where a.category = 'rejection_reason'

condition.name: return_type
condition.title: 退货类型
condition.sql: select a.value id,a.name text from SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary a where a.category = 'return_type'

condition.name: return_reason
condition.title: 退货原因
condition.sql: select a.value id,a.name text from SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary a where a.category = 'rejection_reason'
